description.line2: with a love for cats and the cosmos

quote.text: “We will find a way. We always have.”

About.title: About Me
About.headline: With footsteps as gentle as a kitten’s and curiosity as vast as the universe.
About.description: I’m a software engineer who approaches challenges with calm determination and relentless focus. I believe great code is built not only with logic, but with patience, empathy, and a deep desire to understand what truly matters.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.description: Explore my projects, where I've applied my skills to solve meaningful challenges.

Blog.title: Latest Blog Posts
Blog.description: Check out my thoughts on programming in my most recent posts.

Contact.title: Contact Me
Contact.description: I’m always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
